metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1351 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A tampering vulnerability exists when Git for Visual Studio improperly handles virtual drive paths, aka 'Git for Visual Studio Tampering Vulnerability'.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Nicolas Joly of Microsoft Security Response Center

criterions.comment: git: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
